name: Webinar on Pharmacology
content: Webinar on Pharmacology 2020 will be hosted on May 15, 2020 at 10:00 AM (GMT+1). Panel of speakers will be delivering their presentations on their recent research related to drug or medication and pharmaceutical sciences. Current state of knowledge, its impact on future will be discussed in detailed. Meetingsint invites all experts to be part this webinar series and make it a perfect platform for knowledge sharing and networking
